originalText.text: I Absolutely and highly recommend this podiatrist's office Dr. Kathy Grossos is very knowledgeable and explained everything to me about my foot conditions in full detail her personality is warm and welcoming. Everyone at this office is very friendly and helpful. If you are having problems with your feet this is the place to go to!

originalText.text: I highly recommend this office and Dr. Goldsmith. They were able to see me promptly, and Dr. Goldsmith listened to my concerns and helped me walk pain free for the first time in a while!

originalText.text: I was very happy with my visit. The staff is very helpful, and Dr. Wolfson is kind and generous with his time. He did a detailed examination, explained everything clearly, and even took care of a matter which I had not originally listed as one of my reasons for visiting.  I strongly recommend him!

He did a detailed examination, explained everything clearly, and even took care of a matter which I had not originally listed as one of my reasons for visiting.  I strongly recommend him!

originalText.text: Dr. Jeffry Wolfson is absolutely the best. I was looking for his address to refer him to someone when I came across this opportunity to review this practice. I have always been grateful for Dr. Wolfson saving my mobility with his treatments. My sister and I suffered the same problem, and I even recommended that she travel from Atlanta to see this doctor. Recommend without reservation!

text.text: Dr. Jeffry Wolfson is absolutely the best. I was looking for his address to refer him to someone when I came across this opportunity to review this practice. I have always been grateful for Dr. Wolfson saving my mobility with his treatments. My sister and I suffered the same problem, and I even recommended that she travel from Atlanta to see this doctor. Recommend without reservation!

originalText.text: I was very anxious about getting a Spur treated on my right foot. Dr Wolfson took care of it in a painless and flawless way. He answered all of my questions and spent enough time with me.  He has a great sense of humor which is important to me.  I would recommend him to anyone.
